title: AE脚本-平面图片转三维空间摄像机视差动画 Face 3D v1.0.3+使用教程
author: 大众脸
content:
让您的照片栩栩如生！一款功能强大的 3D 肖像和照片动画工具，使用起来非常简单、速度快，并且由 AI 提供支持。它可以将照片变成可以完全动画化的真实 3D 模型！

Bring your photos to life! A powerful 3D portrait and photo animation tool that is incredibly easy to use, fast and powered by AI. It turns photos into real 3D models that can be fully animated!
supported_versions: After Effects v24.2 及以上版本，带有高级 3D 渲染器。

update_notes: 添加了测试运行 Blender 应用程序的功能
添加了从本地文件夹导入深度图的功能
other.description_en: Bring your photos to life! A powerful 3D portrait and photo animation tool that is incredibly easy to use, fast and powered by AI. It turns photos into real 3D models that can be fully animated!
